solution_line_template: Andy blew up {total_balloons} balloons - the {ashley_balloons} balloons Ashley blew up = <<{total_balloons}-{ashley_balloons}={andy_balloons}>>{andy_balloons} balloons.

We know how long it took Andy to blow up {balloons_per_increment} balloons, so {andy_balloons} balloons / {balloons_per_increment} = <<{andy_balloons}/{balloons_per_increment}={time_increments}>>{time_increments} time increments.

We know the time increment is {minutes_per_increment} minutes, so {time_increments} x {minutes_per_increment} minutes = <<{time_increments}*{minutes_per_increment}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.
